channel.title: Why are todays people the way they are?
channel.description:
ITT: Why are todays people the way they are? I mean the gangsters, the "nerds", the emos, ect.
I honestly think It's a lack of parenting. Most of todays peoples parents are 16 year old mothers, that only stay with their "BF" for 6-7 months till ten sum babies pop out of that abused whores vagina. The people you see today, (Your friends, peers. ect) are probably listening to corrupted music and doing retarded things instead of doing something helpful to your community or society. I understand that I'm not helping by addressing a problem we're all fully aware about, but I don't think this topic has really been discussed properly.
Most of the people buying guns and shooting people have corrupt minds, obviously passed down from their parents. Like I said, lack of parenting, this also includes neglecting, also sometimes bullying (This case probably doesn't come up with parents, most likely classmates.) Like I somewhat agree that putting others down sometimes to boost your self-esteem is right SOMETIMES, but I'm not promoting it. I honestly think that all forms of real life bullying and parent neglectment are horrible things. Most of the kids killing themselves are probably hurt by fucking assholes that tease and make fun of them at school, or/and maybe their parents are selfish cock suckers and don't give a rats ass if they live or die. Sometimes one of these cases may occur, sometimes both. I'm not just saying this because it affects me, because it rarely does. If I see any signs of bullying I tend to try and comfort that person, honestly, I'd suggest you do the same. Even if you don't give a shit, pretend you do, because that really makes a difference in people's lives when people care.
Anyway, I know most of you don't care. But I'm addressing this topic to the people that actually care about todays problems in society.
Discuss your thoughts here, please.
